name: CIS_EKS_v1.1.0 - 3.2.8
title: Ensure that the --hostname-override argument is not set
script:
hostname_override=$(ps -ef | grep kubelet | grep -o '\-\-hostname\-override=[^ ]*' | cut -d= -f2)
hostname_override1=$(ps -ef | grep kubelet | grep -o '\-\-hostname\-override [^ ]*' | cut -d' ' -f2)

if [ -z "$hostname_override" -a -z "$hostname_override1" ]; then
    exit 0
else
    echo "EKS CIS 3.2.8 - Ensure that hostname-override argument is not set"
    exit 1
fi
